'''Lotos Somno Chapter''' is the [[Story Quest]] chapter for [[Nilou]].

==List of Acts==
* Act I - [[To the Wise]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|40;1;The Morn a Thousand Roses Brings|display=bullet|requirements=1}}

==Summary==
===Act I - To the Wise===
{{Main|To the Wise}}
{{Description|At the break of dawn, the Grand Bazaar is bustling with activity as usual.
Even though daily life may feel bland as water, the young girl on stage is able to depict a colorful world through her performance.
However, she seems to have encountered some trouble when preparing for this evening's play and banquet...}}
{{Transclude|To the Wise|Summary}}
